com.tangosol.coherence.config.scheme

Interface NamedTopicScheme

  • All Superinterfaces:
    NamedCollectionBuilder<NamedTopic>, Scheme, ServiceScheme, TopicScheme<NamedTopic,CacheService>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    PagedTopicScheme

    public interface NamedTopicScheme
extends TopicScheme<NamedTopic,CacheService>
    The TopicScheme class is responsible for building a fully configured instance of a NamedTopic.
    Since:
    Coherence 14.1.1
    Author:
    jk 2015.05.21

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface com.tangosol.coherence.config.scheme.ServiceScheme

        DELIM_APPLICATION_SCOPE, DELIM_DOMAIN_PARTITION

      • Methods inherited from interface com.tangosol.coherence.config.scheme.Scheme
